description: An object that is applied to a sample to update one or more attributes and/or one or more external references
title: BioSamples curation object

___externalReferencesPost.description: The updated value for the external reference

___attributesPre.description: The attribute to update, with it's type, value and iri. This need to match the sample in order for the curation to be applied

items.description: Define the way attributes are described in a curation object

___attributesPost.description: The updated version of the attribute
